doc.field: Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Another good view of the light station at sunset. November 18, 2007. Photo #17 of 24 of my 'Point Cabrillo' photoset.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio
Point Cabrillo Light Station in the fading sunset on the Mendocino Coast, CA - cabrillo17

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Leaving the light station behind, climbing back up the hill at sunset. With just a little bit of a rise in elevation of a few feet, you can find the height where the light beam shines directly at you. Added difficulty: trying to actually capture that momentary flash with the camera. I came close several times, but never exact. November 18, 2007. Photo #19 of 24.
california sunset lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Located on the coast just south of Fort Bragg - Point Cabrillo was constructed in 1909. To reach the lighthouse, you park about a mile away, close to Highway 1, and walk down an old access road along the coastal plain to the edge of the bluffs. November 18, 2007. Photo #1 of 24.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. End of the day - A view of the lighthouse in the distance, from the pathway going from the parking area down to the coast. All of the support buildings (such as the lightkeeper's residence) are off to the right partially hidden by the trees. November 18, 2007. Photo #24 of 24.
california sunset lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Off to the sides next to the light station - a couple of little inlets with azure-blue water. The light station is on a bit of a point, with the water cutting inland on both sides. November 18, 2007. Photo #6 of 24.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Off to the sides next to the light station - a couple of little inlets with azure-blue water. The light station is on a bit of a point, with the water cutting inland on both sides. November 18, 2007. Photo #18 of 24.
california blue lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. One of the support buildings in the middle of renovations. Two of the buildings were being fixed up to serve as vacation getaways for tourists. November 18, 2007. Photo #3 of 24.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Another view of the light station. Not a 'light house', with a tall tower (like at Point Arena), but a smaller structure that looks more like a one-room schoolhouse. November 18, 2007. Photo #5 of 24.
california sunset lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Down at the coast, there are a handful of buildings - residences for the lighthouse operators and staff, which have been refurbished. November 18, 2007. Photo #2 of 24.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. View from the back-end of the light station looking inland. Support buildings to the left, and the lightkeepers residences in the background. November 18, 2007. Photo #15 of 24.
california lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio

Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Just beyond the support buildings - the light station itself! Right on the edge of the bluffs, the front of the station facing inland. November 18, 2007. Photo #4 of 24.
california sunset lighthouse coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio
Point Cabrillo Light Station, Mendocino Coast. Blue-pink clouds at sunset. Drizzly most of the day, but it had cleared up enough to just broken clouds now. November 18, 2007. Photo #22 of 24.
california sunset lighthouse clouds coast mendocino lightstation pointcabrillo mlhradio
